level.heading: Establishment of the Office of Vocational Education and Skills Training at the University of the District of Columbia.

level.text: Pursuant to ยง 1-204.04(b), the Council establishes an Office of Vocational Education and Skills Training under the President of the University of the District of Columbia.
VEST shall be responsible for the oversight and coordination of all government-sponsored vocational education, adult apprenticeship, and workforce skills training performed by UDC and DCPS.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 26, 1974, Pub. L. 93-471, title VIII, ยง 802, as added Oct. 1, 2002, D.C. Law 14-190, ยง 2202, 49 DCR 6968.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-190
level.text: For Law 14-190, see notes following ยง 38-1208.01.
